# array

# 数组交集


const arr1 = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5 , 8 ,9]
const arr2 = [5, 6, 7, 8, 9]
const result = arr1.filter(function (val) { return arr2.indexOf(val) > -1 })  //[5, 8, 9]

# 数组并集

const arr1 = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8, 9]
const arr2 = [5, 6, 7, 8, 9];
const result = arr1.concat(arr2.filter(v => !arr1.includes(v))) //[1, 2, 3, 4,5, 8, 9]

# 数组差集

const arr1 = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8, 9]
const arr2 = [5, 6, 7, 8, 9];
const diff = arr1.filter(item => !new Set(arr2).has(item)) //[ 1, 2, 3, 4 ]

# 数组去重

Array.from(new Set([1, 2, 3, 3, 4, 4])) //[1,2,3,4]
[...new Set([1, 2, 3, 3, 4, 4])] //[1,2,3,4]

# 数组排序

[1, 2, 3, 4].sort((a, b) => a - b); // [1, 2,3,4] 升序
[1, 2, 3, 4].sort((a, b) => b - a); // [4,3,2,1] 降序

# 最大值

Math.max(...[1, 2, 3, 4]) //4
Math.max.apply(this, [1, 2, 3, 4]) //4
[1, 2, 3, 4].reduce((prev, cur, curIndex, arr) => {
   return Math.max(prev, cur);
}, 0) //4

# 数组是否包含值

console.log([1, 2, 3].includes(4)) //false
console.log([1, 2, 3].indexOf(4)) //-1 如果存在换回索引
console.log([1, 2, 3].find((item) => item === 3)) //3 如果数组中无值返回undefined
console.log([1, 2, 3].findIndex((item) => item === 3)) //2 如果数组中无值返回-1

# 字符串翻转

function reverseStr(str = "") {
  return str.split("").reduceRight((t, v) => t + v);
}

const str = "reduce123";
console.log(reverseStr(str)); // "321ecuder"
